messages.text: Hi I was wondering if the "Leather bag" was sill available?
Hi! Yes, it is still available. Would you like to meet up and take a look at it in person?
Yes, that would be perfect. Is there anything wrong with it that I should be aware of?
Not treally. I've been taking cate of it very well. Like the post says....it looks like new!!
Perfect. I wanna suggest this address "to" meet up. Let me know if that would be fine
Yea, thats fine. Is 4:00PM today okay?
Perfect! I'll see u there then.
Hey! I am here already...Are you close?

Hey, just wanted to let you know that the item is just as described! Thank you so much..I will make sure to leave a good review in your profile. BTW, the post is still up, in case you forgot, people can still try to reach you to inquire about the bag. Thanks again!!
Hi I was wondering if the "Leather bag" was sill available?
Hi! Yes, it is still available. Would you like "to" meet up and take a look at it in person?
Sure. Any address you want to suggest for meeting up?
How about Hyde Park. By the coffee shop?
That sounds wonderful. I am overdue for a good coffee anyways haha
